import React, { Component } from 'react' import CartService from '../../../service/cart.service' import './CartList.css' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class CartList extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { } this.cartService = new CartService() } getCartInfo() { const userId = this.props.loggedInUser._id this.cartService.getCart(userId) .then(response => this.setState(response.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } componentDidMount = () => { this.getCartInfo() } updateProducts = () => { const productsUpdated = this.props.cart } render() { console.log(this.state) return (
